long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AWS Abbreviation Explainer
Instantly decode AWS abbreviations and service names as you browse!
What it does:

Recognizes over 200 AWS abbreviations and service names on any webpage
Shows brief explanations in a tooltip when you hover over AWS terms
Covers a wide range of AWS services including EC2, S3, Lambda, and many more
Works across documentation, blogs, forums, and any other web content

Perfect for:

AWS newcomers learning the ropes
Experienced professionals dealing with unfamiliar services
DevOps engineers working across multiple AWS services
Anyone reading about AWS who needs quick clarification

Features:

Lightweight and fast - doesn't slow down your browsing
Works offline - no need for internet connection to get explanations
Privacy-focused - doesn't collect or transmit any data
Regularly updated to include the latest AWS services

How it helps:

Save time by quickly understanding AWS terminology without leaving your current page
Reduce confusion when reading about complex AWS architectures
Improve your AWS knowledge effortlessly as you browse
Enhance your productivity when working with AWS documentation or discussions

Never be stumped by an AWS abbreviation again! Install the AWS Abbreviation Explainer and navigate the world of Amazon Web Services with confidence.
